 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּז‎</span>] **verb** (in poetry, mostly Wisdom Literature) ==turn aside, depart== (Late Hebrew Niph\`al, Hiph\`il; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***have recourse to, take refuge*** in); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ אַליָֿלֻזוּ‎</span> [[Prov.3.21|Prov 3:21]] ***let them not*** (i.e. sound wisdom, etc., si vera 1., compare [[BDB#VB|VB]]) ***depart from thine eyes*** (see Hiph\`il). **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָלוֺז‎</span> [[Prov.3.32|Prov 3:32]]; [[Isa.30.12|Isa 30:12]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְלוֺז‎</span> [[Prov.14.2|Prov 14:2]] plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְלוֺזִים‎</span> [[Prov.2.15|Prov 2:15]] — figurative, ***devious, crooked***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמַעְגְּלֹתָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Prov.2.15|Prov 2:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(עִקְּשִׁים‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּרָכָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Prov.14.2|Prov 14:2]] as substantive of person [[Prov.3.32|Prov 3:32]] of course of action [[Isa.30.12|Isa 30:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(עשֶׁק‎</span>, i.e. ***crookedness = craftiness, cunning***, compare [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַליַֿלִּיזוּ מֵעֵינֶיךָ‎</span> [[Prov.4.21|Prov 4:21]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבָרַי‎</span> ***let them*** [my words] ***not depart*** (on form see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:72»§ 72</sup> R. 9) ***from thine eyes*** (strictly, ***let them not practise, exhibit, deviation***, direct causative, [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 205</sup>).
